# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position (x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found that are directly related to copper cable production.

### Power generation structure at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe groups (positions x=107.5, y=-34.5 and x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities (e.g., burner mining drills, burner inserters) have a fuel source before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities (e.g., stone furnaces) have the necessary ingredients before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using steam engines without connection to a power network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power network before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
- Ensure that pipe groups have a fluid source before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using electricity groups without being plugged into an electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
No type-annotated utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
No functions have been invoked, so there is no summary of failure and success modes.
